attributes.message: Hey fellow photographers! üëã how many people keep a DSLR/SLR vs just iPhone photography for their best shots? It’s pretty incredible what you can do with a phone camera now #ShotOniPhone

I have my iPhone, Canon T6i (which I was supposed to sell a year ago but just pushed it off to the side), and a Sony a6400 with a Sigma 16mm f 1.4. I use my iPhone the most for sure and sometimes question why I have a camera outside of my phone but it’s fun for travels! üòÄ
My DSLR has been collecting dust....
